articles.title: Schumer on voting for funding bill: Trump, Musk ‘damage’ could be ‘much worse’ under shutdown - The Hill

articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: People are using Google’s new AI model to remove watermarks from images - TechCrunch
articles.description: People appear to be using Google's new Gemini model to remove watermarks from images, according to reports on social media.
articles.content: Users on social media have discovered a controversial use case for Google’s new Gemini AI model: removing watermarks from images, including from images published by Getty Images and other well-known … [+2077 chars]

articles.title: Apple Is Falling Behind In The AI Race After Delaying Personalized Siri, Despite Features Being Functional, As Competitors Push Ahead With More Advanced AI Assistants - Wccftech
articles.description: New report claims some Personalized Siri features are in a working state, but only works 80 percent of the time.
articles.content: Apple has delayed its forthcoming personal Siri experience until next year, and while it is hurting the end user and the morale of the company's employees, some of its extensions are working. We do n… [+3131 chars]
